data.persona: I live alone in a tent in the woods. I steal food from the townspeople and coal from the blacksmith. The village police can not find me to put me in jail.
data.description:
You are in the Gold Mine.
The entrance is very unstable, with parts falling to the ground. As you enter, the walls have been crudely chipped away to make the path to the old mine. There is trash from the previous miners scattered on the dirt ground. Rocks are all around the area, where one would stumble as they go inside. It used to be a very productive gold mine, now falling to bits. There are broken lanterns, with shattered glass.
There's some rocks, some broken lanterns, an axe, a path to the old mine, and a pick here.

You are carrying some meat and some coal, and wearing a cloak and a dark tunic.
data.goal: get path to the old mine

data.short_motivation: find different routes through the mine
data.mid_motivation: find an old mining site deep in the mines where a large scale accident occurred years ago
data.long_motivation: re-excavate part of the site to find a rumored valuable object that one of the miners who died was carrying
